original_title: Special Dengue Control Programme in Colombo & suburbs
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A special Dengue Prevention and Control Programme has been launched in Colombo and its suburbs.
This is due to the rapid spread of Dengue in the Western province.

The number of Dengue infections reported in Wellawatte, Pamankada, Narahenpita, Cinnamon Gardens, Fort and Grandpass has spiked, Chief Medical Officer of the Colombo Municipal Council Dr. Ruwan Wijayamuni said.
"The public must seek medical attention if a fever lasts more than two days," he said.
